required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Food Effect Study of SHR2554 on Healthy Chinese Male Adult Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open, Single-center, Two-cycle, Double-sequence Crossover Study to Investigate the Effects of a High-fat Diet on the Pharmacokinetics of Healthy Chinese Male Adult Subjects After Oral Administration of SHR2554 Tablets

brief_summary.textblock:
The primary objective of the study is to evaluate the effect of high-fat diet on pharmacokinetics of healthy Chinese male adult subjects after oral administration of SHR2554 tablets.
The secondary objective of the study is to evaluate the safety of single dose of SHR2554 orally in healthy subjects.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and Day 8 of the single dose
Day 1 and Day 8 of the single dose
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) of SHR2554

arm_group.description: Drug: SHR2554 fasted in P1, high-fat diet in P2 SHR2554 administration in fasted condition in period 1, SHR2554 administration after high-fat diet in period 2
Drug: SHR2554 high-fat diet in P1, fasted in P2 SHR2554 administration after high-fat diet in period 1, SHR2554 administration in fasted condition in period 2
